Publish.LongDescription:
# ART-Zone
Custom zoning for new and existing roads.
## Features Control zoning on roads - Preview tool: just hover the road to see what you get instantly! - Easy and Intuitive: Right-click flips the current zoning preview, Left click confirms. - Adds a small “Zoning Side” panel next to the Road tabs and looks/acts like vanilla. - New Roads, old Roads - no problem! - remembers your last selection of Both/none/left/right. - Options to lock/protect existing buildings and already zoned grids from changing. - Three ways to start zoning: - Top left icon (4 square symbol) - Roads Services tab (4 square symbol) - Optional Shift+z keybind
### Multi-Language UI (7) * English, Français French, Español Spanish * 日本語 Japanese, 한국어 Korean, 简体中文 Simplified Chinese * Português Brazilian
## How to use 1. Open **Roads** → click the **ART-Zone** tool (4-squares icon). 2. **Zoning Side** mini-panel appears (Left / Right / Both / None). 3. **Hover a road** to see a preview of zoning cells. 4. **Right-Click** to cycle previews: - **Left ↔ Right** when any side icon is selected. - **Both ↔ None** when Both or None is selected. 5. **Left-Click** once to apply. 6. **Optional:** **Shift+Z** shortcut to open the tool panel (not required).
Tip: You can Right-Click multiple times to preview different outcomes, then Left-Click once to commit.
## Compatibility - Safe to remove any time. - This mod not use Harmony; safe/compatible (reduces possibility of breaking with every game update). - Mod back-end design for robust, minimal, and low-conflict. Front-end for safe/intuitive UX (extends vanilla UI instead of replacing it). - Uses the game’s input system; sounds and selection feedback designed to feel vanilla.
### Support * If the mod helps you, give it a Like and let your friends know about it :) * Feedback at Cities: Skylines Modding Discord: https://discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2
## Roadmap - Planned: more languages - Planned: contour/topography toggle in the same mini-panel for terrain-aware zoning.
